markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wind Tempered](/Feats.aspx?ID=2595) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sylph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=311" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 114 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You are at home in tempestuous weather and accustomed to even the harshest winds. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5) and [electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) effects. If you roll a success on a save against an air effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Wind Tempered
